ma_crossover.name: Moving Average Crossover
ma_crossover.description: Buy when fast MA crosses above slow MA, sell when crosses below

rsi.name: RSI Strategy
rsi.description: Buy when RSI is oversold, sell when overbought

macd.name: MACD Strategy
macd.description: Buy when MACD crosses above signal, sell when crosses below

bollinger_bands.name: Bollinger Bands
bollinger_bands.description: Buy when price touches lower band, sell when touches upper band

pair_trading.name: Pair Trading
pair_trading.description: Statistical arbitrage between two correlated assets. Long/short when spread deviates from mean.
